page.title: 11EVENTS
page.content: We phoned the secutery of {Ardoch Show Mr D Bruce Jamison to ask him about { {Ardoch Show,}he told us :The chairman of {Ardoch Show}this year is {Captain {Ben Coutts.}He also said {Ardoch Show is an agricultural show which is held every year at {Lodge Park.}Every year there is a childrens art competition this year the craft is a coloured picture of {Braco}either in felt or in felt pens(depends on age).There are many categories for the competitions.There are working hunter,best yield mare(Highland),best Aberdeen angus bull,best Aberdeen angus cow,best herd of sheep.Mr Jamison said every year about 1000 animals enter.In the industrial section the classes are :best confectionary and baking they are in section 1,in section 2 are traditional home crafts,and in section 3 are
